archimate:Folder.name: Chapter 02 - Setting up Node.js
archimate:Folder.documentation: Before getting started with using Node.js, you must set up your development environment. In the following chapters, we'll use this for development and for non- production deployment. In this chapter, we will cover the following topics: How to install Node.js from source and prepackaged binaries on Linux, macOS, or Windows How to install Node Package Manager (NPM) and some popular tools The Node.js module system Node.js and JavaScript language improvements from the ECMAScript committee So let's get on with it.
